|brand = Z-Com |model = XN-625 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = M4Y-XN625V01 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:19:70
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9227; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/11/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Used by [[Sagemcom F@ST 3764]] • [http://i42.tinypic.com/34qr91w.jpg Board pictures] {{see also|Zcomax XN-625}}
===Specifications=== *High-speed Wireless-N 802.11bgn (2.4 GHz), 18.5dBm Tx Power *Data rate up to 300Mbps at 40 MHz, complied with 802.11b/g *MIMO technology with 2 antenna RF connectors available *Linux drivers support with the complete software feature sets
==Links of Interest== [http://www.zcomax.com/files/XN-625.pdf Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Z-Com XN-180]] • [http://www.zcomax.com/files/XN-180.pdf Datasheet] *[[Z-Com XN-620]] • M4Y-XN620V04 (07/11/2007) *[[Z-Com XN-623]] • M4Y-XN623V01 (05/11/2009) *Z-Com XN-625 • M4Y-XN625V01 (05/11/2009) • [http://www.zcomax.com/files/XN-625.pdf Datasheet] *[[Z-Com XN-721]] • M4Y-XN721V01 (08/18/2008) *[[Z-Com XN-750]] • M4Y-XN750V1 (09/27/2011) • [http://www.zcomax.com/files/XN750.pdf Datasheet] *[[Z-Com XN-790]] • M4Y-XN790V01 (08/09/2007) *[[Z-Com XN-791]] • M4Y-XN791V02 (04/07/2008) *[[Z-Com XN-990]] • M4Y-XN990V02 (10/11/2007) *[[Z-Com XN-2050]] • M4Y-XN2050V01 (12/10/2009)
